projectGridLines.title: Software Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Note : Internship Position available only for one continuing student


Sub-Work Title: Building AI technologies using LLMs


Description: Developing Artificial Intelligence infrastructure for Houseware. 1) Understanding clients needs and implementing AI strategies based on data collected 2) Talking to customers to further understand and build strategies

Skill sets: Java, Python, Javascript, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

Expected learning: 1) Understanding of the datastack, 2) Optimization of the flow of data into warehouses, 3) Understanding of metrics store and building visualization tools on top of it.

Specific courses required for project execution: Object Oriented Programming, Operating Systems, Discrete Math, Applied Statistical Methods, Statistical Inference and Applications, Bhagavad Gita, Current Affairs
